entries.title: Hamburgler Spotted on Campus
entries.body: BE ADVISED: a suspicious character dressed in old-timey prison stripes and repeating "rabble rabble" was reported in the vicinity of Angel Hall. This individual has a record of crimes against fast food and should be considered dangerous.

entries.title: Raining Cats & Dogs
entries.body: WARNING: Central Campus is currently under a Dangerous Weather Advisory. Students and non-emergency staff are encouraged to stay indoors. Individuals who must travel should use caution and carry Milkbone TM biscuits and catnip at all times.
